long_description: Use the compact Exotac NanoStriker(TM) firestarter as a keychain until the moment comes when you need to start a fire. The self-contained design puts all the tools you need into 1 tiny package. Ferrocerium rod stows inside the knurled body; unscrew the rod, flip it around and screw it back on and it's ready for use. Rod works when dry or wet-simply scrape it with the tungsten carbide striker to send sparks flying; provides more than 1,000 strikes and can be replaced. Exotac NanoStriker is 3.3 in. long when stowed and 4.2 in. long when in use. O-rings keep moisture from getting inside and onto the striker and the rod.
short_description: Use the compact Exotac NanoStriker(TM) firestarter as a keychain until the moment comes when you need to start a fire. The self-contained design puts all the tools you need into 1 tiny package.
